name: Kaguya's Spring Waltz
description:
Princess Kaguya’s folklore has a special place in my heart. The costume design is inspired by Isao Takahata's work, and the tree is inpired from Van Gogh's almond. If you look closely, you can see Kaguya’s parents, her lover, and the moon people taking her home are painted on her Kimono.
